entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Local smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
